channel.title: [PI] Client Help [PI]
channel.description:
I'm geting this error on run. When it loads to config this error comes out. I've looked at all those spots and can't seem tho find the error.
I'm using a Project Insanity Client.
[code=java] RS2 user Client - release #317 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:63) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:2125) at Client.startUp(Client.java:7472) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:35) at Client.run(Client.java:4722) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
How do I change the Project Insanity Game from to the original 317 game frame. I hate PI's Gameframe.

item.title: [PI] Client Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Eclipser Eclipser
item.description:
@Eclipser wrote:

I need a tutorial on how to remove the 474 Gameframe and add a 317 Gameframe. I also need to fix them run errors, if you can’t help don’t post. It’s really simple.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

Eclipser:

You pretty much spammed this thread. I either want a 317 gameframe tutorial for Project Insanity and how to fix the error.

“Spammed” means something else, but if you don’t need help go ahead, I’ll ignore this thread.

Read full topic
